org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.dao

Interface GenericDao<E,K extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - Entity type
    K - Key type of the entity
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CategoryDao, CommentDao, ImageDao, ImageService, IngredientDao, MeasureDao, RatingDao, RecipeDao, RecipeService, UserDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoryHibernateDao, CommentHibernateDao, GenericHibernateDao, ImageHibernateDao, ImageHibernateService, IngredientHibernateDao, MeasureHibernateDao, RatingHibernateDao, RecipeHibernateDao, RecipeHibernateService, UserHibernateDao

    public interface GenericDao<E,K extends java.io.Serializable>
    Generic Interface for Data Access Objects, defining some basic database transactions.
    Author:
    Nils Sommer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      K add(E entity)
      Adds an entity.
      void delete(E entity)
      Deletes an entity.
      E find(K key)
      Finds an entity by its key.
      java.util.List<E> findAll()
      Finds all entites.

      Updates an entity.

        Finds an entity by its key.

        Adds an entity.
        Parameters:
